# defaultProperties

**Instance Property**

Default properties defined by the developer for this type of game activity.

## Declaration

```swift
var defaultProperties: [String : String] { get }
```

## Getting the display properties and image

- **title**: A short title for the game activity.
- **details**: A more detailed description of the game activity.
- **loadImage(completionHandler:)**: Asynchronously load the image. Error will be nil on success.

items.description: A short title for the game activity.
